channel.title: Charting Alberta Covid
channel.description: Recent content on Charting Alberta Covid

item.title: Schools and Students
item.description: Covid-19 Cases in Youth Covid-19 Cases in Alberta Schools See Support our Students Alberta for the complete list of schools with Covid-19 cases. See Global News' Lauren Pullen reporting for more school VOC information.

item.title: Daily Covid-19 Briefing
item.description: Daily Covid-19 Briefing Tuesday, May 11, 2021 - Prepared by ALPINE1 Today 1,533 new cases of Covid-19 were identified in the province. The adjusted total of cases is 1,449 including changes to previous case numbers between November 27th and May 9th. The current 7 day trend of cases is 1,764, a decrease of -2.1% from the day before. This time last week trend was 1,994. This is a decrease of -12%.

item.title: Outbreaks
item.description: Current Numbers of Outbreaks by AHS Zone Calgary Zone 114 Edmonton Zone 56 South Zone 20 Central Zone 21 North Zone 51 Covid-19 outbreaks (not including schools, see below) current as of Tue, May 11, 2021. AHS non-school outbreak data updated on Tuesdays and Fridays. Outbreak Charts Alberta Schools are not included on this map after January 18th, 2021 as the criteria for outbreaks in schools changed.

item.title: Variants of Concern
item.description: Current Covid-19 VOC Cases in Alberta Active VOC cases 9574 -1099 % of identified cases 38.3% -3.66% Total VOC cases identified 39287 256 Total VOC recovered 29600 1353 Total deaths from VOC 113 2 VOC specimens screened 67143 330 Covid-19 variants of concern data current as of Mon, May 10, 2021.
